price: 彼（ルート*）は言った。「我が主*よ、腐敗*を働く民に対して、私を勝利させて下さい」。
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي عَلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi unṣur'nī ʿalā al-qawmi al-muf'sidīna
